thread.title: Shah Rukh Khan finds 'Paajji' Mika great
thread.title_full: Shah Rukh Khan finds 'Paajji' Mika great - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Shah Rukh Khan finds 'Paajji' Mika great
text:
Singer Mika Singh has shared online an old photograph in which he is seen getting superstar Shah Rukh Khan's popular pose -- spreading arms -- almost right. Delighted by the gesture, SRK called the singer "great".

Shah Rukh Khan and Mika Singh 
The 'Aaj ki party' hitmaker shared the image on Twitter which he is seen on a stage. He captioned it: ""Hey bro @iamsrk this is your most popular pose which I did in 1988 when I was 10 years old."
In response to the tweet, King Khan tweeted: "Paajji tussi great ho (brother you are great)".
SRK also shared moments of his "quietitude" on the micro-blogging site.
"I wake up and sit quietly for 15 minutes. Quietitude. This silent 'life' hides the voices of my dreams and I hear them sing. Then blackness of coffee," Shah Rukh tweeted.
